content.rendered:
Directed by Vikranth Pawar. Jai Sharma

Written by Shiva Shankar Bajpai. Nisarg Mehta. Nikhil Nair

Cast Saurabh Shukla( Pramukh Swaroop9 episodes, 2022 ). Ankur Nayyar( Sandeep Bajaj9 episodes, 2022 ). Happy Ranajit( Toothpick9 episodes, 2022 ). Rajesh Tailang( Parimal Singh8 episodes, 2022 ). Sahidur Rahaman( Mangal / …7 episodes, 2022 ). Pankaj Sharma( Sachet singh / …6 episodes, 2022 ). Tisca Chopra(unknown episodes ). Mukesh Tiwari( Bhairo Singhunknown episodes ). Lehar Khan( Raniunknown episodes ). Rohan Joshi( Aneyunknown episodes ). Bhumika Dube(unknown episodes ). Rahul Tewari(unknown episodes ). Hima Singh(unknown episodes)

Language Hindi

Producers Peeyush Chaturvedi. Himank Gupta. Varun Malik. Mahesh Menon. Deepak Dhar. Mahesh Korade. Rishi Negi. Ankur B. Saraiya

Production Banijay Asia.

Season 1

Episodes 9
